description: Gold set for evaluating skill extraction pipeline - 25 real job description samples

testCases.title: Senior Product Manager
testCases.description: We are looking for a Senior Product Manager to lead our growth initiatives. Requirements: - 5+ years of product management experience - Strong SQL and data analysis skills - Experience with experimentation and A/B testing - Proficiency in product strategy and roadmap development - Experience with HubSpot or similar CRM - GA4 and analytics tools Nice to have: - Python scripting skills - Experience with Amplitude or Mixpanel - Excellent communication and leadership skills

testCases.title: Growth Marketing Manager
testCases.description: Growth Marketing Manager needed for fast-paced startup. Required: Lifecycle marketing expertise, Customer segmentation and funnel optimization, Proficiency in Salesforce, Marketo, and Braze, SQL for data analysis, Experience scaling customer acquisition. Preferred: Python for automation, Experience with Looker or Tableau, Knowledge of conversion rate optimization. We value teamwork and collaboration.

testCases.title: Data Analyst
testCases.description: Join our analytics team as a Data Analyst. You must have: Expert SQL skills (required), Python or R programming, Statistical analysis and data modeling experience, Experience with Snowflake or BigQuery, Tableau or Power BI for visualization. Bonus: Machine learning fundamentals, dbt experience. Looking for a detail-oriented self-starter with problem-solving abilities.

testCases.title: Revenue Operations Manager
testCases.description: RevOps Manager to optimize our go-to-market operations. Requirements include: Revenue operations experience, CRM strategy and Salesforce administration, Data analysis and reporting using SQL, Experience with Outreach and Gong, Pipeline management and forecasting. Nice to have: Python scripting, Experience with ZoomInfo or Clearbit, Strong communication skills.

testCases.title: Marketing Operations Specialist
testCases.description: Marketing Ops role focused on automation and analytics. Must have experience with: Marketing automation platforms (Marketo, Pardot), SQL for data extraction, Campaign analytics and reporting, A/B testing and experimentation, Email marketing strategy. Preferred: JavaScript for custom integrations, Segment or mParticle CDP experience, Google Analytics 4. Team player with attention to detail.

testCases.title: Customer Success Manager
testCases.description: CSM to drive customer retention and expansion. You will need: Customer lifecycle management experience, Data analysis skills (SQL preferred), Experience with Gainsight or Totango, CRM proficiency (Salesforce), Understanding of SaaS metrics (NRR, churn). Plus: Intercom or Zendesk experience. Must have excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

testCases.title: Business Intelligence Analyst
testCases.description: BI Analyst to build dashboards and insights. Required qualifications: Advanced SQL skills, Data modeling and warehouse design, Looker or Tableau expertise, Python for data transformation, Statistical analysis. Desired: dbt or Airflow experience, BigQuery or Redshift, Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving.

testCases.title: Demand Generation Manager
testCases.description: Lead our demand gen efforts. You should have: Experience with ABM strategies, Proficiency in 6sense or Demandbase, Content marketing and SEO, HubSpot or Marketo, SQL for attribution analysis, Google Ads and LinkedIn Ads. Nice to have: Drift or Qualified for conversational marketing. Results-oriented with strong communication.

testCases.title: Product Analyst
testCases.description: Product Analyst for our PLG motion. Requirements: SQL expertise (must have), Product analytics with Amplitude or Mixpanel, Experimentation design and analysis, Python for data analysis, User behavior analysis. Preferred: Pendo or FullStory, Segment experience. Self-motivated with attention to detail.

testCases.title: E-commerce Manager
testCases.description: E-commerce Manager for our DTC brand. Looking for: Shopify Plus experience, Google Analytics 4 and GA4 events, Klaviyo email marketing, Facebook Ads and Meta advertising, Conversion rate optimization. Plus: Attentive SMS, Triple Whale attribution. Must be a team player with strong organizational skills.

testCases.title: Marketing Analyst
testCases.description: Marketing Analyst to support client analytics. You need: SQL and data visualization, Google Analytics and GA4, Looker Studio or Data Studio, Excel and Google Sheets (advanced), Marketing attribution modeling. Nice to have: Python, R, Supermetrics. Detail-oriented with problem-solving skills.

testCases.title: CRM Manager
testCases.description: CRM Manager to own our Salesforce instance. Requirements: Salesforce administration and configuration, SQL for reporting, Data hygiene and deduplication, Integration with marketing tools, Process automation with Flows. Preferred: Salesforce Marketing Cloud, CPQ experience. Strong communication and leadership abilities.

testCases.title: Growth Product Manager
testCases.description: Growth PM to drive user activation. You bring: Product-led growth experience, Experimentation and A/B testing, SQL for analysis, Amplitude or Mixpanel, User onboarding optimization, Feature adoption analysis. Plus: Python, Segment CDP. Collaborative team player.

testCases.title: Digital Marketing Manager
testCases.description: Digital Marketing Manager for full-funnel campaigns. Must have: Paid media experience (Google Ads, Facebook Ads, LinkedIn Ads), SEO and content strategy, Marketing automation (HubSpot or Marketo), Google Analytics 4, Conversion tracking and attribution. Desired: Programmatic advertising, DV360. Excellent communication skills required.

testCases.title: Sales Operations Analyst
testCases.description: Sales Ops Analyst to optimize sales processes. Requirements: Salesforce reporting and dashboards, SQL for data analysis, Pipeline analytics, Territory planning, Forecasting models. Nice to have: Tableau, Clari, Gong. Self-starter with attention to detail.

testCases.title: Lifecycle Marketing Manager
testCases.description: Own our lifecycle marketing strategy. You need: Lifecycle marketing and retention, Customer segmentation, Email marketing (Klaviyo or Braze), SMS marketing (Attentive or Postscript), SQL for analysis, Churn prevention strategies. Plus: Python automation. Strong communicator.

testCases.title: Data Engineer
testCases.description: Data Engineer to build our data infrastructure. Required: SQL and Python, ETL/ELT pipelines, Snowflake or BigQuery, dbt for transformations, Airflow or Prefect, Data modeling. Preferred: Fivetran, Segment, AWS or GCP. Problem-solver with strong analytical skills.

testCases.title: Performance Marketing Manager
testCases.description: Performance Marketing Manager for paid acquisition. Must have: Google Ads (Search, Display, YouTube), Facebook/Meta Ads, LinkedIn Ads, Attribution modeling, SQL for analysis, Budget optimization. Nice to have: TikTok Ads, The Trade Desk. Results-driven with attention to detail.

testCases.title: Customer Analytics Manager
testCases.description: Customer Analytics Manager for insights team. You bring: Customer analytics and segmentation, SQL (expert level), Python or R for analysis, CDP experience (Segment, mParticle), Looker or Tableau, Cohort analysis and LTV modeling. Plus: Machine learning. Curious with strong communication.

testCases.title: Marketing Technology Manager
testCases.description: MarTech Manager to own our marketing stack. Requirements: Marketing technology strategy, Integration architecture, Salesforce and HubSpot, CDP implementation (Segment), SQL for data, JavaScript for tracking, Vendor management. Preferred: APIs and webhooks. Strong organizational and communication skills.

testCases.title: Email Marketing Specialist
testCases.description: Email Marketing Specialist for our campaigns. You need: Email marketing strategy, HTML/CSS for email, Klaviyo or Mailchimp, A/B testing, Deliverability optimization, Segmentation. Nice to have: SQL, Litmus, Email on Acid. Detail-oriented team player.

testCases.title: Web Analytics Manager
testCases.description: Web Analytics Manager for our digital properties. Must have: Google Analytics 4 implementation, Tag management (GTM), Conversion tracking, SQL for data analysis, A/B testing platforms (Optimizely, VWO), Attribution analysis. Preferred: JavaScript, BigQuery. Analytical thinker.

testCases.title: Partner Marketing Manager
testCases.description: Partner Marketing Manager for our ecosystem. Requirements: Partner marketing programs, Co-marketing campaigns, Salesforce PRM, HubSpot, Content creation, SQL for reporting. Nice to have: Impact.com, PartnerStack. Excellent communication and relationship-building.

testCases.title: GTM Strategy Manager
testCases.description: GTM Strategy Manager for market expansion. You bring: Go-to-market strategy, Market analysis, Competitive intelligence, Pricing strategy, SQL for data, Salesforce and HubSpot, Cross-functional collaboration. Preferred: Product marketing, ABM. Strategic thinker with leadership skills.

testCases.title: Conversion Rate Optimization Manager
testCases.description: CRO Manager to drive website optimization. Must have: Conversion rate optimization, A/B testing (Optimizely, VWO, AB Tasty), User research and heatmaps (Hotjar, FullStory), Landing page optimization, SQL for analysis, Google Analytics 4. Nice to have: JavaScript, Unbounce. Data-driven with attention to detail.
